item.description:
Carbone's (Italian) is my pick for the Hartford Arts Council's Winter "Taste of Hartford". To see the special $20.11 menu, click this link: http://3.bp.blogspot....

Loved this place the last time I went - we did the expensive a-la-carte with salad & dessert chef making those items for us tableside. To see their regular menu click here: http://www.carbonesct...

We will be in the small private room - seating is limited to 16, so only RSVP if you are going to be there!! (Please do not make me take attendance and punish no-shows with expulsion from the group - I much prefer it when everyone acts like an adult and keeps their promise to attend.)

I will collect $1.00 from each attendee for group costs which will be donated to the Arts council which is sponsoring this event and collecting at the restaurants.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CARBONE'S 1/19/11 7:00PM
